# About fastreeR

To install `fastreeR` package:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly=TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("fastreeR")
```

utils::sessionInfo()
